body.name: Aechy Curve Roller Stamp for Crafts, Triple Tip Stamp with 9 Colors & 9 Patterns, Stamp Set for Kids Teachers Journaling Scrapbook Note Taking Supplies
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 50 mins
features: 【Revolution of Underlining】Be prepared for the experience of drawing lines like never before: Originally developed by Aechy, a set of triple tip colored stamps equipped with special roller tips, turn complicated mark lines into a single draw, none of the trouble, all of the fun.

【9 Vivid Colors & Patterns】9 carefully designed different colors and patterns allow you to easily add exquisite decorative lines to your journals and paintings. Using water-based ink, non-toxic and harmless, safe for children to use.

【Improved Roller Structure】The Aechy roller stamp adopts a newly designed silicone roller. Compared with the traditional plastic roller, the pattern is finer, the drawing is clearer, and the direction is easier to control.
【Upgraded Ink Supply】Distinctive ink storage structure, each pattern is supplied with independent ink, writing distance can be up to 400 meters (per tip).
【Ergonomic Body Design】Triangular ergonomic body design, comfortable to hold, easy to play. Clear protective caps on each end allow you to easily identify the pattern.

【Well Packaged and Perfect Service】Our roller stamp set comes in a steady storage box, could be a great gift for Christmas, birthdays, Back to school, etc. We'll respond to questions or needs with perfect sales service within 12 hours.
body.description: Silicone Roller Stamp Tip Patented silicone roller tip, smoother than traditional plastic roller. Able to create more complex patterns and easier to control. Just Enjoy adding tons of fun colors to notes, drawings, journals and more using AECHY coloring stamps! Package Size: 3.5 x 3.3 x 2.4 IN; Package Weight: 0.24 LB Package Content: 3 Pieces Roller Stamps

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About AECHY AECHY has been dedicated ourselves to creating unique and practical merchandise from the very beginning. We focus on digging into interesting ideas and turn them into real products. If there's any product that hasn't been invented yet, then it's our job to make it happen.

9 Colors Curve Roller Stamp Set by ​AECHY Lets you express yourself with exquisite mark lines and drawing. The AECHY curve roller stamp set provides delicate and expressive patterns, great for all kinds of drawing.

Specifications 9 vivid colors & equisite patterns Triple tip design, each pcs contains 3 various line types Water-based Ink, quick-dry and acid-free 0.6 mm wide mark lines Silicone Roller Stamp Tip Patented silicone roller tip, smoother than traditional plastic roller. Able to create more complex patterns and easier to control. Just Enjoy adding tons of fun colors to notes, drawings, journals and more using AECHY coloring stamps! Package Size: 3.5 x 3.3 x 2.4 IN; Package Weight: 0.24 LB Package Content: 3 Pieces Roller Stamps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, work well
reviews.reviewText: Had tried the pens for granddaughters, but these work so much better. Ink distributes well, great that each has three patterns, easier to store. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for journaling!
reviews.reviewText: I love the bright colors and ease of use. These are perfect for adding that little extra to my journals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They will bleed through my journals paper
reviews.reviewText: I use the Hobonichi journals and unfortunately this stamps bleed through the paper. Otherwise they are quite beautiful, easy to use and nice designs. Just keep in mind the quality of the paper you are going to be using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great gift for the grandchildren.
reviews.reviewText: I bought three boxes as gifts for some of my grandchildren. We tried them out and they work well, easy to handle with the triangular shape. Colors are bright and clear. I couldnt be more pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are so cute. A real nice addition to my scrapbooks. Also great customer service. They were very responsive when I spoke with them. Thank you so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best of what’s on amazon
reviews.reviewText: One of the best roller stamps on Amazon. Curved highlighters are rarely good, but these are the best I’ve got from Amazon or shein or temu.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool but one issue
reviews.reviewText: I like these but there’s one thing that annoys me. There’s no sort of marking on them that shows what design comes from which end, so you have to open them and check every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are so fun! I like the colors and shapes. If I had a complaint, it would be that the color skips sometimes when I draw a longer line.
